# Browser MCP Server

A browser MCP (Model Context Protocol) server implementation based on WebSocket communication, allowing AI assistants to control your browser.

## Project Information

For detailed information, please refer to the main project README files:

- [English README](../README_EN.md)
- [Chinese README](../README.md)
